name: Mad Miner
description:
Mad Miner is a mining game where you try to survive in a new order where world life is trapped underground.

Try to survive by taking care of your oxygen and hunger in procedurally generated mines!



Plant and harvest crops, produce oxygen with the oxygen machine, and dig up everything that comes your way! Sit back and play comfortably. Because enemies that will sneak up on you are never found in Mad Miner! Pay attention to your oxygen level and hunger.



Your own production benches to produce. Some welds can be produced in some special looms. Get materials to craft items and resources for materials too! You will not understand how time flies as you get lost in this beautiful cycle.

Mad Miner has an enjoyable resource gathering cycle. It is neither too complex nor too simple.
